# ToDoApp - MERN Stack Setup Instructions

## Project Overview
Full-stack MERN todo application with add, modify, delete, and summary functionality.

## Setup Checklist
- [x] Create .github/copilot-instructions.md
- [ ] Scaffold MERN project structure
- [ ] Setup backend dependencies
- [ ] Setup frontend React app
- [ ] Install dependencies
- [ ] Create tasks for running the app
- [ ] Test the application
- [x] Always suggest storing API keys and secrets in a .env file.
-
- [ ]   Never inline API keys directly in code.

- [x] Document setup and run instructions in README.md
- [ ] Commit and push code to GitHub repository
- [ ] Create GitHub repository and push code
- [ ] Enable GitHub Copilot for the repository
- [ ] Verify Copilot suggestions are relevant to MERN stack development
